snippet.title: Vinylove - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Every song brings back a memory, and this is why music is so important to us.

This is the concept behind "Vinylove", a new small exploration experience set in one bedroom, focused on the links between the music we love and the memories they relate to.

Out now on Itch.io: https://spacebananagms.itch.io
Out September 10th on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/924460/Vinylove/
Other games: spacebananagms.itch.io
Official website: http://www.spacebananastudio.com
